feed.title: RecipeSage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump the angular group with 19 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1753
  • fix: meal calendar snacks language translation by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1757

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.12...v3.0.13

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1758
  • chore(deps): bump the aws group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1761
  • chore(deps): bump csv-parse from 5.6.0 to 6.0.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1772
  • chore(deps): bump the sentry group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1762
  • chore(deps): bump the capacitor group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1765
  • chore(deps): bump @ionic/angular from 8.6.3 to 8.6.4 in the ionic group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1763
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @swc/core from 1.12.9 to 1.12.11 in the swc group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1764
  • chore(deps): bump sanitize-html and @types/sanitize-html by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1769
  • chore(deps): bump sharp from 0.34.1 to 0.34.3 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1770
  • chore(deps-dev): bump brace-expansion from 1.1.11 to 1.1.12 in the npm_and_yarn group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1773
  • chore(deps): bump linkifyjs from 4.1.3 to 4.3.1 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1767
  • chore(deps): bump the angular group with 14 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1766
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1774
  • feat: support alternative model names by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1788
  • chore(deps): bump the angular group with 14 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1783
  • chore(deps): bump @ionic/angular from 8.6.4 to 8.6.5 in the ionic group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1781
  • chore(deps): bump the prisma group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1778
  • chore(deps-dev): bump eslint from 9.30.1 to 9.31.0 in the eslint group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1777
  • chore(deps-dev): bump sinon from 20.0.0 to 21.0.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1784
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @swc/core from 1.12.11 to 1.13.0 in the swc group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1782
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group with 3 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1775
  • chore(deps): bump the sentry group with 4 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1780
  • chore(deps): bump multer from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 in the multer group by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1776

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.13...v3.0.14

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.15
entry.content:
What's Changed
